alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Hillsborough; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 11 at 10:47PM EST until December 11 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHESHIRE...WESTERN HILLSBOROUGH AND SOUTH CENTRAL MERRIMACK COUNTIES... At 1047 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Moultonborough to near Gilmanton to near Weare to near Greenfield, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jaffrey, Henniker, Peterborough, Hopkinton, Antrim, Marlborough, Greenfield, Lyndeborough, Dublin, Francestown, Bennington, Richmond, Harrisville, Nelson, Rindge, Hancock, New Ipswich, Sharon, Deering and Fitzwilliam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
